<color=#d4bf5f>Heavy Attack: Wind Strike</color>
<color=#ffffff>When Yangyang gets 3 [Cleaving Winds], heavy attack will strike as Wind Strike to deal</color> <color=#46c3d4ff>Aero DMG</color><color=#ffffff> and knock back enemies</color>

<color=#d4bf5f>Plunge Attack: Feathery Blade</color>
<color=#ffffff>When Yangyang gets 3[ Cleaving Winds], plunge attack will consume all [Cleaving Winds] to perform multiple slashes to strike down and deal</color> <color=#46c3d4ff>Aero DMG</color><color=#ffffff>. Yangyang will sheath her sword and slash again to deal </color><color=#46c3d4ff>Aero DMG</color><color=#ffffff></color>.

<color=#d4bf5f>Heavy Attack</color>
<color=#ffffff>Danjin combines her Forte with the spectrum, and consumes stamina to launch rapid slashes</color>

<color=#d4bf5f>Plunge Attack</color>
<color=#ffffff>Consumes stamina and slashes down from midair to deal</color> <color=#e649a6>Havoc DMG</color><color=#ffffff>.</color>

<color=#ffffff>Within certain time after evasion, Danjin's next normal attack becomes slash strike according to the sword spectrum.</color>

<color=#ffffff>Danjin can use Tattered Vermilion after Evasion Counter to trigger Vermilion Eclipse by tapping Resonance Skill twice.</color>

<color=#d4bf5f>Heavy Attack</color>
<color=#ffffff>Danjin combines her Forte with the spectrum, and consumes stamina to launch rapid slashes</color>

<color=#d4bf5f>Plunge Attack</color>
<color=#ffffff>Consumes stamina and slashes down from midair to deal</color> <color=#e649a6>Havoc DMG</color><color=#ffffff>.</color>

<color=#d4bf5f>Evasion Counter</color>
<color=#ffffff>Within certain time after evasion, Danjin's next normal attack becomes slash strike according to the sword spectrum.</color>

<color=#d4bf5f>Evasion Counter: Chasing Shadows</color>
<color=#ffffff>Danjin can use Tattered Vermilion after Evasion Counter to trigger Vermilion Eclipse by tapping Resonance Skill twice.</color>

<color=#ffffff>After fully charging Scarlet Essence, Danjin can perform more powerful rapid slashes to deal</color> <color=#e649a6>Havoc DMG</color><color=#ffffff>, and recover HP for herself.</color>
<color=#ffffff>Within certain time after using Heavey Attack: Scarlet Chaos, Danjin's next normal attack triggers attack of Fallen Blossoms, deals</color> <color=#e649a6>Havoc DMG</color><color=#ffffff>, and extend the duration of Vermillion Eclipse Carving.</color>

<color=#d4bf5f>Normal Attack</color>
Wields the Claymore to perform at most 4 continuous attacks.

<color=#d4bf5f>Heavy Attack</color>
Consumes stamina to initiate <color=#f4d582>Xuanwu's Defense</color>.

<color=#d4bf5f>Posterior Strategy</color>
In this state, Taoqi focuses more on defense. Continuously consumes stamina and reduces DMG.
During <color=#f4d582>Xuanwu's Defense</color>, Taoqi will trigger <color=#f4d582>Posterior Strategy</color> once got hit and perform counter-attack.
Once consumes all stamina, <color=#f4d582>Xuanwu's Defense</color> ends and Taoqi launches 1 attack immediately. Deals</color> <color=#e649a6>Havoc DMG</color><color=#ffffff>.</color>

Consumes stamina to launch plunge attack and deal</color> <color=#e649a6>Havoc DMG</color><color=#ffffff>.</color>

<color=#d4bf5f>Evasion Counter</color>
<color=#ffffff>Within certain time after evasion, next normal attack deals</color> <color=#e649a6>Havoc DMG</color><color=#ffffff>.</color>

<color=#d4bf5f>Tortoise Lifespan</color>
Triggering <color=#f4d582>Posterior Strategy</color> allows Taoqi to launch follow-up attacks by consuming [Resilience].
Consuming each [Resilience] performs 1 follow-up attack, 3 follow-up attacks can be performed in total.
Hitting targets with follow-up attacks recovers HP for all Resonators in party.

<color=#d4bf5f>Gaining [Resilience]</color>
Using <color=#f4d582>Impenetrable</color> gets 1 [Resilience].
Using <color=#f4d582>Offensive Defense</color> gets 2 [Resilience].

Performs 5 continuous attacks. The 3rd, 4th, and 5th attacks deal</color> <color=#46c3d4ff>Aero DMG</color>.

Consumes stamina to perform stab strike and deals <color=#46c3d4ff>Aero DMG</color>.

<color=#d4bf5f>Heavy Attack: Wind Riding Strike</color>
Holds normal attack during <color=#f4d582>heavy attack</color> to perform Wind Riding Strike after heavy attack and deals <color=#46c3d4ff>Aero DMG</color>.

<color=#d4bf5f>Heavy Attack: Cloud Diving Slash</color>
Releases normal attack during <color=#f4d582>heavy attack</color> to perform Cloud Diving Slash after heavy attack and deals <color=#46c3d4ff>Aero DMG</color>.

<color=#d4bf5f>Midair Attack</color>
Consumes stamina to throw lance into the ground and deals <color=#46c3d4ff>Aero DMG</color>. Using normal attack after the lance stab into the ground will perform another attack.

<color=#d4bf5f>Midair Attack: Sky Soaring</color>
Performing Wind Riding Strike and <color=#f4d582>Wind Stilling Swipe</color> in midair allows attacks in midair and deals <color=#46c3d4ff>Aero DMG</color>.

Within certain time after evasion, next normal attack strikes with lance and deals <color=#46c3d4ff>Aero DMG</color>.

<color=#d4bf5f>Heavy Attack</color>
<color=#ffffff>Consumes stamina to charge and attack target.</color>

<color=#d4bf5f>Plunge Attack</color>
<color=#ffffff>Consumes stamina to plunge down and deals</color> <color=#9656d8ff>Conducto DMG</color><color=#ffffff>.</color>

<color=#d4bf5f>Evasion Counter</color>
<color=#ffffff>Within certain time after evasion, next normal attack deals</color> <color=#9656d8ff>Conducto DMG</color><color=#ffffff>.</color>

<color=#d4bf5f>Dim Lightning</color>
<color=#ffffff>Tapping Shocking Fist creates Wedge of Withering Night. Wedge of Withering Night will attack with active Resonator within the area of Dim Lightning and deal</color> <color=#9656d8ff>Conducto DMG</color><color=#ffffff> once in every 2.5s.
Wedge of Withering Night lasts for 10s.</color>

<color=#d4bf5f>Myriad Thunder</color>
<color=#ffffff>Holds Shocking Fist while Thunder Thorns are full to cast Myriad Thunder and deal</color> <color=#9656d8ff>Conducto DMG</color><color=#ffffff>. Inflicts 1 Thunder Mark.
Myriad Thunder will detonate Wedge of Withering Night 5m near Yuanwu to deal</color> <color=#9656d8ff>Conducto DMG</color><color=#ffffff>, and inflict 1 Thunder Mark.</color>

<color=#ffffff>Yuanwu becomes Ruthless for 6s after casting Myriad Thunder and gains great bonus on attacking ability:
<color=#d4bf5f>Normal attacks</color> have wider attack range and DMG bonus. Deal</color> <color=#9656d8ff>Conducto DMG</color><color=#ffffff> and reduce more enemies' plangency.
<color=#d4bf5f>Heavy attacks</color> will charge toward enemies ruthlessly and deal</color> <color=#9656d8ff>Conducto DMG</color><color=#ffffff>. Reduce more enemies' plangency.</color>

<color=#d4bf5f>Thunder Marks</color>
<color=#ffffff>Increases DMG dealt to targets with Thunder Marks.
The more stacks of Thunder Marks, the more the DMG bonus. Thunder Marks last for 12s and can stack 3 times.</color>

<color=#d4bf5f>Thunder Scars</color>
<color=#ffffff>Thunder Scars increase the effect of Thunder Marks by 2 times.
Increases DMG dealt to targets with Thunder Scars.
The more stacks of Thunder Scars, the more the DMG bonus. Thunder Scars last for 12s and can stack 3 times.</color>

<color=#d4bf5f>Gaining Thunder Thorn</color>
<color=#ffffff>Yuanwu gradually gets Thunder Thorn no matter in or off battle while Wedge of Withering Night is on the field.
Wedge of Withering Night's attack helps get 5 Thunder Thorns.
Haunting Memories' attack helps get 20 Thunder Thorns.

When Thunder Thorns are full and enemies are knock on to the Wedge of Withering Night by Yuanwu's attacks, Wedge of Withering Night is detonated and deals Conducto DMG, inflicts 1 Thunder Mark upon enemies.</color>

<color=#d4bf5f>Thunder Scars</color>
<color=#ffffff>Thunder Scars increase the effect of Thunder Marks by 2 times.
Increases DMG dealt to targets with Thunder Scars.
The more stacks of Thunder Scars, the more the DMG bonus. Thunder Scars last for 12s and can stack 3 times.</color>

<color=#d4bf5f>Gaining Thunder Thorn</color>
<color=#ffffff>Yuanwu gradually gets Thunder Thorn no matter in or off battle while Wedge of Withering Night is on the field.
Wedge of Withering Night's attack helps get 5 Thunder Thorns.
Haunting Memories' attack helps get 20 Thunder Thorns.

When Thunder Thorns are full and enemies are knock on to the Wedge of Withering Night by Yuanwu's attacks, Wedge of Withering Night is detonated and deals Conducto DMG, inflicts 1 Thunder Mark upon enemies.</color>
